name: Example ARF 1.8 PID SD-JWT TYPE METADATA
description: Example PID SD-JWT Verifiable Credential Type Metadata, based on ietf-oauth-sd-jwt-vc (draft 13), using a single language tag (en-US). Adheres to PID Rulebook ARF 1.8 (urn:eudi:pid:1) and later, as of the time of publication.
$comment: Implementation of this example type metadata may require Member State–specific clarifications to align with national policies governing the display of included claims.

display.label: Last name
display.description: Current last name(s) or surname(s).

display.label: First name
display.description: Current first name(s), including middle name(s) if applicable.

display.label: Date of birth
display.description: Full birth date (day, month, year).

display.label: Place of birth
display.description: Place where the person was born.

display.label: City of birth
display.description: Municipality, city, town, or village where the person was born.

display.label: Region of birth
display.description: State, province, district, or local area where the person was born.

display.label: Country of birth
display.description: Country where the person was born.

display.label: Nationality
display.description: Country of nationality.

display.label: Nationalities
display.description: Country or countries of nationality.

display.label: Personal ID
display.description: Unique personal identifier assigned by the authority.

display.label: Birth last name
display.description: Last name(s) or surname(s) at birth.

display.label: Birth first name
display.description: First name(s), including middle name(s), at birth.

display.label: Sex
display.description: Recorded sex or gender, using standard codes.

display.label: Email
display.description: Person's email address.

display.label: Mobile
display.description: Person’s mobile phone number.

display.label: Address
display.description: Person's residential address.

display.label: Full address
display.description: Full formatted address of residence.

display.label: Residence street
display.description: Street name of residence.

display.label: Residence number
display.description: Street number of residence.

display.label: Residence ZIP
display.description: Postal or ZIP code of residence.

display.label: City of residence
display.description: Municipality, city, town, or village of residence.

display.label: State of residence
display.description: State, province, or regional division of residence.

display.label: Country of residence
display.description: Country where the person currently resides.

display.label: Age equal or over
display.description: Age threshold indicators.

display.label: Age equal or over 14
display.description: Indicates if the person is 14 years old or older.

display.label: Age equal or over 16
display.description: Indicates if the person is 16 years old or older.

display.label: Age equal or over 18
display.description: Indicates if the person is 18 years old or older.

display.label: Age equal or over 21
display.description: Indicates if the person is 21 years old or older.

display.label: Age equal or over 65
display.description: Indicates if the person is 65 years old or older.

display.label: Age
display.description: Person's age in completed years.

display.label: Birth year
display.description: Year in which the person was born.

display.label: Issuing authority
display.description: Name of the issuing body or Member State (two-letter code).

display.label: Issuing country
display.description: Member State where the document was issued.

display.label: Expiry date
display.description: End date of the document’s validity.

display.label: Issue date
display.description: Start date of the document’s validity.

display.label: Document number
display.description: Unique identifier of the PID document.

display.label: Issuing region
display.description: Regional or local subdivision that issued the document.

display.label: Trust anchor
display.description: The trust anchor used to verify the document.
